member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScaleLabelOptions.Orientation

summary.para: Provides different types of orientation for labels on the Circular scale.

member.value: An object that specifies possible ways labels can be oriented.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Lists the possible ways arc scale labels can be oriented.
Arc scale labels are painted from bottom to top.
Arc scale labels are painted from left to right.
Arc scale labels are painted radially to the corresponding values on a scale.
Arc scale labels are painted tangentially to the corresponding values on a scale.
Arc scale labels are painted from top to bottom.
A layer that contains properties to define the visual presentation of a circular scale.
Initializes a new instance of the class with default settings.
A collection that stores the layers of a particular arc scale.

member.name: M:DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScaleLayerCollection.#ctor(DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScale)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified owner.

member.param: An object that should be the owner of the created collection.

summary.para: Lists possible layouts of an arc scale.
An arc scale appears as an ellipse whose length depends on the start and end scale angles.
An arc scale always appears as a circle that tries to occupy as much space as possible.
An arc scale appears as an ellipse whose sides are stretched.
An arc scale appears as the upper half of a circle which tries to occupy as much space as possible.
An arc scale appears as an upper left quarter circle.
An arc scale appears as an upper right quarter circle.
An arc scale is displayed as a three quarter circle.
An arc scale marker.
Initializes a new instance of the class with default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScaleMarker.Options

summary.para: Gets or sets the options of a marker that specify its shape and position on a Circular scale.

member.value: An object that contains the settings of the marker.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
A collection that stores the markers of a particular arc scale.

member.name: M:DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScaleMarkerCollection.#ctor(DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScale)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified owner.

member.param: An object that should be the owner of the created collection.

summary.para: Contains layout options for an arc scale marker.
Initializes a new instance of the class with default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Gauges.ArcScaleMarkerOptions.Orientation

summary.para: Provides different types of orientation for the marker on the Circular scale.

member.value: An object that specifies possible ways the marker can be oriented.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Lists the possible ways arc scale markers can be oriented.
An Arc scale marker isn’t rotated when painted, and its default orientation is used. For example, in the picture below, a marker’s model represents an arrow oriented from right to left.
The Arc scale marker is rotated, so that at any point on a scale a marker is radially oriented from the scale center.
The Arc scale marker is rotated, so that at any point on a scale a marker is radially oriented to the scale center.
The Arc scale marker is rotated clockwise by 90 degrees when being painted. For example, in the picture below, a marker’s model represents an arrow oriented from bottom to top.
The Arc scale marker is rotated counterclockwise by 90 degrees when being painted. For example, in the picture below, a marker’s model represents an arrow oriented from top to bottom.
The Arc scale marker is rotated, so that at any point on a scale a marker is tangentially oriented to the corresponding values on a scale.
The Arc scale marker is rotated by 180 degrees when being painted. For example, in the picture below, a marker’s model represents an arrow oriented from left to right.
An arc scale needle.
Initializes a new instance of the class with default settings.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
A collection that stores the needles of a particular arc scale.
